tnote.storage

Class TNotesStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • tnote.storage.TNotesStorage

  • public class TNotesStorage
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages how tasks are saved in T-Note. It maintains a master list of all tasks saved, a list of folders in which each task is stored, a list for tasks without timings (floating tasks), and a list for recurring tasks. It retrieves the necessary information about tasks and returns it to the TNotesLogic class Tasks can be saved or deleted, and tasks with similar names cannot be added. Changing the directory of the saved location is supported as well.
    Author:
    A0124131B

        Parameters:
        task - the TaskFile object to add into the system
        Returns:
        true if the TaskFile object is successfully saved to the system
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - I/O Error when saving the TaskFile as a text file
        TaskExistsException - Error when a task with the same name already exists
        InvalidFileNameException - Error when the specified task will create a text file with an invalid name

      • addRecurringTask

        public boolean addRecurringTask(RecurringTaskFile newRecurringTask)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.text.ParseException,
                                IncorrectTimeException,
                                InvalidFileNameException,
                                TaskExistsException
        Method to add a recurring task with a specified set of dates into the system
        Parameters:
        newRecurringTask - the Object containing all necessary information about the task and the dates it recurs
        Returns:
        true if the task is successfully added to the system
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - I/O Error when create a text file associated with the task
        java.text.ParseException - Error parsing the date and time for individual instances of the task
        IncorrectTimeException - Error because the end date and time of the task is before its start date and time
        InvalidFileNameException - Error when the task name specified will create a text file with an invalid name
        TaskExistsException - Error when a task with a similar name already exists in the system

        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Error when the specified task cannot be found in the system
        java.text.ParseException - Error parsing the date and time of the specified task
        InvalidFileNameException - Error when the specified task name contains invalid file characters
